articles.title: Liverpool sign Dominik Szoboszlai from RB Leipzig - The Athletic
articles.description:
Liverpool have completed the signing of Dominik Szoboszlai from RB Leipzig.
The Hungarian attacking midfielder has signed a five-year deal after the Anfield club triggered his £60million release clause with the Bundesliga club.
